comments.body: Ditto, we can co-locate serialize / deserialize logic in the proposed `PlotlyPlotOptions`.
Wonder if there is a way to have a single source of truth for all these constants.
Yeah, not sure. If we could define string constants in proto, maybe we could refer to them in all generated languages? edit: but these do not seem to actually exist

Changed this (from #968) to just set the query params instead of adding `queryParams` to the existing ones in the passed-in URL, which removed the need to use the `query-string` library & URLSearchParams interface
Instead of displaying the full notebook path here, just display the last part (after the last slash).
